articles.title: Former Autonomy chief Mike Lynch acquitted in US fraud trial - Financial Times
articles.description: UK tech entrepreneur had been extradited to face criminal case over $11bn sale to HP in 2011
articles.content: Then $75 per month.Complete digital access to quality FT journalism on any device. Cancel anytime during your trial.

articles.title: How to build a DOA product: Humane AI Pin founders banned internal criticism - Ars Technica
